TopicTitle: Glider for the "How Far Can You Go?" Challenge

Articles.Content:
This is the craft file for my listed challenge.

Edited April 25, 2013 by jebowlin72

This doesn't really work, because you can glide indefinitely.

Edited April 25, 2013 by astropapi1

Did I ever tell you the definition of... "Infiniglide"?

Actualy if you bother to go to the challenge post, and read the rules of the challenge there, you would realize how irrelivant your statment is, yes I know about inifiniglide but if you follow the rules of the challenge post, infiniglide is impossible, and I dare you to prove me wrong.

It's not that infiniglide is IMPOSSIBLE. Infiniglide is still, by all accounts, doable.

It's just absolutely not permitted by the challenge.

Also, someone else WILL jump hard on this. PLEASE provide pictures of your craft, even if it's from Imgur, because forum rules MANDATE you must.

It's not that infiniglide is IMPOSSIBLE. Infiniglide is still, by all accounts, doable.

It's just absolutely not permitted by the challenge.

Also, someone else WILL jump hard on this. PLEASE provide pictures of your craft, even if it's from Imgur, because forum rules MANDATE you must.

there is an image of the craft on the other thread but i will add the "Kite" here as well, and I never said infiniglide was impossible, I merely stated that I think it is impossible with this purticular craft.
